title: #223:  Julie's Unbelievable Bawls
description:
Grab your passports because it's time to go back to England. It's New Years on "Ladies of London," and everyone's having a blast until Caroline makes a yoga joke. That's when the JUBs hit the fan. Ronnie Karam (trashtalktv.com) and Ben Mandelker (bsideblog.com) dish about everything from Julie's Unbelievable Balls to Caroline's unicorn scandal.
Then it's off to the high seas as a new deckhand and several drunkards board "Below Deck." Be sure to crack open your favorite beer (with your teeth) for this one.
As always, you can support us at Patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens and Like Us at facebook.com/watchwhatcrappens

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
